Title: Transcriptome profiling of Burkholderia pseudomallei wildtype strain1026b and BP1026b_II1046::T4 insertion mutant
Description: We identified BP1026b_II1046 (SapR) to be an important transcriptional regulator controling surface attachment factor 1 (sap1). RNA-seq analysis was performed to further investigate the regulatory network of SapR regulation.
